context: The 2010 consulting landscape was recovering from the 2008-2009 financial crisis. Cloud computing was emerging as a major trend, and clients were increasingly demanding integrated business and technology solutions. Indian offshore firms had matured significantly, and the Big Four accounting firms were aggressively expanding their consulting practices after earlier divestitures.

competitors.name: IBM Global Services
competitors.notes: Top IT consulting and services competitor with comprehensive offerings

competitors.name: Deloitte Consulting
competitors.notes: Leading Big Four consulting practice with technology and strategy services

competitors.notes: Major consulting competitor focusing on business transformation
